attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to Governmant to look into the theft of course fish for the table.As the governmant is aware fishing as a recreational pastime is a sport favoured by millions,and brings a great deal of money into the economy.Should this practice be allowed to continue many waters would,over time ,be devoid of fish (like many waters in Eastern Europe) and as such have a serious effect not just on the local economy but throughout the UK as a whole.
We would like to see the Government take a more proactive role in ending this practice.
